etymology.description: pictogram: a flail and a threshing device; unrelated to ⺕ ‘hand’.
etymology.interpretation: Depicts a flail paired with a threshing device used for processing grain, reflecting an agricultural scene. Over time it was borrowed to denote the seventh Heavenly Stem, shedding its original concrete tool sense.

examples.chinese: 今年是庚子年(今年是庚子年)。
examples.english: This year is a Gengzi year.

examples.chinese: 他用庚作为天干的第七位(他用庚作為天干的第七位)。
examples.pinyin: Tā yòng gēng zuòwéi tiāngān de dì qī wèi.
examples.english: He uses geng as the seventh of the Heavenly Stems.

examples.chinese: 古代农民用连枷打谷，与庚字本义相关(古代農民用連枷打穀，與庚字本義相關)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔdài nóngmín yòng liánjiā dǎ gǔ, yǔ gēng zì běnyì xiāngguān.
examples.english: In ancient times, farmers used flails to thresh grain, which relates to the original meaning of geng.
